scripts.demo:keycloak: if docker info --format '{{.Architecture}}' | grep -q aarch64; then npm run demo:keycloak:m1; else npm run demo:keycloak:other; fi
scripts.demo:keycloak:m1: docker start keycloak-demo || docker run -p 8080:8080 --name keycloak-demo -e KEYCLOAK_USER=admin -e KEYCLOAK_PASSWORD=admin -e KEYCLOAK_IMPORT=./imports/realm.json -v $(pwd)/imports/realm.json:/imports/realm.json wizzn/keycloak:14
scripts.demo:keycloak:other: docker start keycloak-demo || docker run -p 8080:8080 --name keycloak-demo -e KEYCLOAK_USER=admin -e KEYCLOAK_PASSWORD=admin -e KEYCLOAK_IMPORT=./imports/realm.json -v $(pwd)/imports/realm.json:/imports/realm.json quay.io/keycloak/keycloak:latest
